title: Hybrid Education Based on Multimodal Instructional Design for Delegation Competency Enhancement in Nursing

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Blended education environment combining online theoretical learning and offline case practice for current nursing professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five-step delegation process (receiving-assessing-planning-assigning-evaluating) with 90% accuracy.
Learners can determine delegation priorities based on patient conditions in a simulation environment, achieving 80% alignment with real-world standards.
Learners can write a legally and ethically compliant delegation decision document (approximately 3,000 characters) in team-based collaborative projects.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
